mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task_io_data (task_run_id, io_type, name, data_type, data_value, data_size, created_at) VALUES (#{taskRunId}, #{ioType}, #{name}, #{dataType}, #{dataValue}, #{dataSize}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM task_io_data WHERE task_run_id = #{taskRunId} AND io_type = 'OUTPUT' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
